summary: npm install fails in Docker when building with TypeScript SDK 1.7.3 due to missing prebuilt binaries for the core-bridge native module, requiring Rust/Cargo to compile from source.
userImpact: Users cannot build Docker containers with the TypeScript SDK 1.7.3 unless Rust/Cargo is installed in the image.
rootCause: The 1.7.3 release was published without prebuilt binaries for the @temporalio/core-bridge native module, forcing npm install to attempt compilation with cargo.
workaround: Lock the SDK version to 1.7.2 in package.json until 1.7.4 is released with prebuilt binaries.
resolutionDetails: Version 1.7.4 was published with prebuilt binaries included, resolving the compilation requirement.
keyQuote: I just published 1.7.4 that includes the prebuilt binaries.
